dct_title_s: Royaume de Bengale, et les pays voisins du Gange : situez entre le Mogolistan et le Pegu, tireá des Meámoires de Nuno de Cunha,
dct_description_sm: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:12,000,000 ; (E 73°12'00"--E 98°21'00"/N 32°30'00"--N 17°00'00"). Relief shown pictorially. Date from previous call number. In lower right:"52." In Dutch and French.
15 x 22 centimeters, on sheet 37 x 46 centimeters
Ames Library of South Asia Maps
